attributes.action: Clarify 9am-6pm Mon-Fri type Controlled Parking Zone Restrictions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These zones are clearly to reduce congestion during office hours so surely they should also exclude bank holidays. All it would take is some small text or a sticker saying excl. bank hols. I've just been fined for parking outside my own house on a bank holiday and this is clearly mindless following of rules and avarice...

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
